organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: But Rdainah said Arafat would go to Cairo on Saturday for talks with Mubarak .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Arafat |
| Cairo |
| Mubarak |

In this paragraph, "Arafat" is a person, but he is referred to as an organization here because the context is about his role as the leader of the Palestinian Authority. "Cairo" is a city and can be considered an organization in the sense of a political or diplomatic entity. "Mubarak" is the name of the President of Egypt at the time, so it is also an organization in this context as a political entity.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Palestinian Authority (represented by Arafat) |
| Egypt (represented by Mubarak) |
| Cairo |

In this revised answer, I have identified "Palestinian Authority" as the organization that Arafat represents, and "Egypt" as the organization that Mubarak represents. This more accurately reflects the organizational entities mentioned in the paragraph.
